document_data.name: ''Veil of Vanity''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Veil of Vanity''''' was an ancient enchanted [[ring]] of [[elf|elven]] make looted from the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: The ''Veil of Vanity'' ring was decorated with an intricate etched floral design.
document_data.Powers: This ring granted the wearer enchanted charisma at the cost of reduced wisdom and slightly reduced intelligence.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''Veil of Vanity'' found its way into the claws of [[lizardfolk]], one of the groups of humanoids that fought over the dominance of the ruins of the City of Song. The lizardman wearing the ring could be found on the [[Halls of Stone]] level of the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] of Myth Drannor.
